alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 10:49AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR THE HAVASU CREEK BASIN IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM MST/1130 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is expected to continue. * WHERE...A portion of north central Arizona, including the following county, Coconino. * WHEN...Until 1030 PM MST Friday /1130 PM MDT Friday/. * IMPACTS...Flooding along Havasu Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1032 AM MST /1132 AM MDT/, river guage reports near Heather Wash indicated that water levels upstream have begun to lower. However, flow remains elevated along Havasu Creek and is expected to remain above flood stage through tonight. - This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Havasu Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Supai and Havasupai Reservation. - This includes the following swimming holes... All swimming holes on Havasu Creek near Supai. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Report any flooding to local law enforcement and the NWS Flagstaff when you can do so safely.
